thread.title: Shore town that fought dunes braces for their construction — all summer long
thread.title_full: Shore town that fought dunes braces for their construction — all summer long

author: Amy S. Rosenberg
title: Shore town that fought dunes braces for their construction — all summer long
text:
— In the battle between Margate and the State of New Jersey over whether to build dunes along the edge of this Shore town, there was a clear loser: the people in Margate who are opposed to the dunes. 
— the Army Corps says no and regularly does dune work in shore towns at the height of summer. 
ores beginning mid-June, right after they finish up similar work in Longport, which did not fight the dunes. Amy S. Rosenberg | Updated:
